scripts.build: rm -r dist; tsc; cp -r node_modules dist/node_modules; cd dist; rm -r node_modules/typescript; rm -r node_modules/.bin; rm -r node_modules/@types; zip -r lambda.zip .
scripts.upload: rm lambda.zip; tsc; zip -r lambda.zip .; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SmartHomeGraphQL --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
